vendor_name: Red Cliffs Mirissa by The Serendipity Collection
title: Sri-Lanka Cliff-Top Mirissa Villa Luxury with Infinity Pool
description: Get your dose of sun, sand and surf when you stay in the architect-designed cliff-top pavilion, Red Cliffs, Mirissa by The Serendipity Collection. Designed by renowned architect Geoffrey Bawa, this stunning villa has been stripped back to a minimalist design, letting the landscape take focus. The lush lawn leads the way to the infinity pool that looks over Weligama Bay, while the tropical gardens are the perfect spot for a yoga platform and meditation space.
location_description: Red Cliffs Mirissa by The Serendipity Collection

vendor_name: Villa Vista by The Serendipity Collection
title: Sri-Lanka Hilltop Designer Villa with Infinity Pool
description: Jungle and sea collide in the slice of Sri Lankan paradise that is Villa Vista Mirissa by The Serendipity Collection. Designed by famous Japanese architect Shingeru Ban, this stunning hilltop villa and cottage invites in natural light and a cool breeze, while its lofty position means spellbinding views of Weligama Bay. The result? An architectural wonder that's beyond comparison. During your stay, take a dip in the glorious infinity pool or unwind on the nearby daybeds that overlook the jungle.
location_description: Villa Vista Mirissa by The Serendipity Collection
offer_address: Mihirikanda Watta, Henwala, Mirissa 81740, Sri Lanka
